author: brane
msg: Add svn_config functions for parsing boolean option values.
of the default value, use NULL and a pointer check instead. Show the option

author: julianfoad
msg: Make "svn log" obey "--quiet" in XML mode just as it does in non-XML mode:
that is, to omit the log message.
"--quiet" may be a poor name for the option, but that's another matter.
(log_message_receiver_xml): Omit the log message if told to.  Fix comments.

author: julianfoad
msg: bash_completion: Fix the test to match the change that I made in r7525.
Exclude any synonym that is just a truncation of its full name.

author: julianfoad
msg: We say "version control", not "revision control".  Changed where the user can
see it: documentation, help and error messages, but not source code comments.

author: philip
msg: Optimise the svn_wc_entry function by avoiding the need to create
an svn_error_t on the normal code path.  This reduces by 5% the
CPU used by 'svn status' on a Subversion trunk working copy.
